name: Zeeverse
intro: P2E Metaverse built on Proof of Work economics
introduce: Zeeverse is an online game decentralized metaverse revolving around Pokémon-inspired creatures known as Zee Monsters. Players can collect, breed, and battle their Zee Monsters in an exciting turn-based strategy game. What makes Zeeverse different from other blockchain games is that it favors rewarding players who are able to reach an advanced level of skill either in creating or gaming.
